page.title: 10Fairs, Fun Run,Five-a-Side
page.content:
Buntingford Christmas Fun Run
This first took place in 1981 and has become an annual event. Some hundreds of runners take part, many of them using it as part of their training for the London Marathon at Easter. The runners are sponsored. Most of the money raised goes to Cancer Research, but in 1984 some was used for Doctors' cars, a Heart Machine and sports equipment for Ward Freman School.
Funfairs visit Buntigfod twice a year, at the Norfolk Road playing fields. They have Dodgems, Space 2000 and many other exciting things.
Once a year, there is a Five-a-side soccer competition for teams from all over Hertfordshire. It is run by Mr. Colin Page.
